soutenir.d1: Framasoft would not exist without our strong volunteer community but could not work anyway without the association which pays seven permanent employees. Our funding relies on you, which means every individual donation. If you think we deserve it‚Ä¶

d: You are on the point %c$.modal.don[1]% a resource free from the forty or so Framasoft network projects.

This resource is free (and will be for as long as we exist) because Framasoft is a non-profit organisation whose objective is precisely the diffusion of free software and its culture to the widest possible audience.
But all this is made possible because Framasoft is supported by the donations of its users.
Thank you for taking a few minutes by helping us to perpetuate and develop our action.

libre.d1: 1600+ software indexed, tagged and tested, this is the historical initial project by Framasoft. Content also include howtos and full reviews.

dvd.t1: Full tank of Freedom in a DVD
dvd.d1: This DVD is full with best free software for Windows, Mac and GNU/Linux (distro included) with additional free and open source cultural content (texts, photos, audio and video files). A dedicated Education version is also available.

pack.d1: Framapack offers an handy way to pick on the best Free or open source software for Windows with updated version. You just select the ones you wish and they all install on one click !

start.d1: The top free and Libre software on a single page.

pad.d1: Let's write together on the same document in real time in an online interface. No prior registration required, a nick is enough, every participant has her own color and let's go!

calc.d1: Framacalc is a spreadsheet program that lets you edit colloratively and easily on the same online document.

forms.d1: Framaforms vous permet de cr√©er les questionaires dont vous avez besoin, que ce soit dans un cadre scolaire, familial ou associatif. Cr√©ez vos questions en fonction de vos besoins, des formulaires √† choix multiples aux champs de texte libre.

bee.t1: This metasearch engine is foraging the Web for you
bee.d1: Framabee is a free and anonymous metasearch engine. You search request is processed via this engine and sent to various search engines, then the results are displayed in your browser. The intersting point is Framabee is running between you and Google (and other popular search engines), so your personal data such as IP address, search history, geolocation, and profile are not collected by search engines.

carte.d1: Framacarte lets you draw, mark, colorize, annotate‚Ä¶ basemaps from OpenStreetMap, then you can show them on your website or print.

dio2.d1: Online services as provided by hegemonic giants such as Google, Amazon, Facebook, Apple or Microsoft (GAFAM) are putting our digital life and privacy at risk. Framasoft was indulging in a big challenge : offer, with your help, a Libre, Ethic, Decentralized and Solidary alternative for every popular service.

cuo.t1: Contributopia‚ÄØ: de-googl-ify is not enough
cuo.d1: Framasoft invites you on an exciting journey: let's explore digital worlds together. worlds where computer tools are conceived in collaboration, where respectful practices swarm and pollinate, where the doors of contribution open.
